name: usemods
description: Zippy little modifiers and utilities for your frontend.

scripts.release: npm run test && changelogen --release && npm publish && npm run module:release
scripts.docs: concurrently "npm run docs:install && npm run module:dev" "npm run dev"
scripts.module:dev: npm run build && npm run --prefix ./nuxt-module dev
scripts.module:release: bun run copy-version-number.ts && npm run --prefix ./nuxt-module release
scripts.vercel:build: bun run build.mjs && npm run build && npm run --prefix ./nuxt-module dev:prepare && npm run --prefix ./nuxt-module prepack && npm run --prefix ./nuxt-module/docs build

author: Jeremy Butler <jeremy@littlefox.studio>
